entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 5:30 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -17.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -20.0°C
Wind: SSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
